TITLE: Sketching Out Our Website!
DESCRIPTION: This is the beginning of our online presence. We're building a new website describing our research unit and its activities!
Longer description: We will use this first blog post to understand how to use the [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) static site generator and customize it to our publishing needs. We will therefore frequently change the content of this blog post to reflect our progress in setting up the website and to experiment with different features.

TITLE: New logo!
DESCRIPTION: We are proud to share our new identity
